text: @BBCBreakfast @BBCNews ..ok beach goers , told you so ,  how killer this Covid-19 is, you did not listen ..so we will see some of you in mortuary and later at cemetery. You can now say goodbyes to your friends and families. Yes ! sorry , you might have even spread to them and most of us and me. Idiots!
